page.title: 10SCHOOL LIFE cont'd +CREDITS.
page.content:
The oldest children go camping every June to Pateley Bridge.They study the ecology and visit places of local interest.Being away from family and home is a new experience for most. Our school dinner costs 60p per meal. Today we had Roast Pork,Potatoes,Peas, Cabbage,Gravy; Apple Pie and Custard. Out of 132 children here today 91 had dinner,21 sandwiches and 9 are away. Pages 1 to 10 were written by : J.Adamson,M.Goulding,J.Peaker,C.Smith, R.Rhodes,J.Smith,C.Taylor,J.Humphries, R.Wood,S.Alfred,A.Hicks,B.Hicks,M.Shaw S.Hodgson,S.Horry,P.Thorpe,G.Appleton, A.Wedgwood,J.Willis,R.Compton,C.Doyle, R.Cartwright,W.Hirst,G.Austin,K.Brown, K.Sargeson,D.Watson,A.Rhodes,H.Miller, S.Crowther,L.Rowland,T.Cook,G.Hann
THE VALE PRIMARY SCHOOL,KNOTTINGLEY.
